name: Aurora
description:
'''Aurora''', also known as '''Aurora UK''', are a British [[electronic dance music]] group, consisting of keyboardist/guitarist Sacha Collisson (born 14 November 1970) and fellow keyboardist Simon Greenaway (born 4 July 1969). Five of their singles charted on the [[UK Singles Chart]]; their biggest hit is their cover of [[Duran Duran]]'s "[[Ordinary World (song)#Aurora version|Ordinary World]]" at No. 5.

Their first and only self-titled album was released in 2002 by [[EMI Records]].
